story.text: UNITED NATIONS South Korean Ban Ki-Moon takes over as the new United Nations secretary-general on Tuesday. Following is a list of secretaries-general of the United Nations:-- 1946-1952 - Trygve Lie of Norway-- 1953-1961 - Dag Hammarskjold of Sweden-- 1961-1971 - U Thant of Burma (now Myanmar)-- 1972-1981 - Kurt Waldheim of Austria-- 1982-1991 - Javier Perez de Cuellar of Peru-- 1992-1996 - Boutros-Ghali of Egypt-- 1997-2006 - Kofi Annan of Ghana-- 2007----- - Ban Ki-Moon of South Korea
story.title: factbox : secretaries - general of the united nations
